amendment.description: Page 5, beginning on line 17, strike "of the service delivery model or models that the eligible entity may need to develop for the model to operate" and inserting "to operate at least 1 approved model of home visiting".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 115-331 to allow states to take into account staffing, community resource, and other requirements when determining how to operate at least one home visiting model in communities in need of services.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (NE) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Smith (NE).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (NE) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
